entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
